parameters.query:
SELECT
    CASE
      WHEN bc.broker_id IS NOT NULL THEN true
      ELSE false
    END as hasbroker,
    COALESCE({{$json["conversationId"] || 'NULL'}}, 0)::integer as conversation_id,
    bc.broker_id,
    bc.status,
    b.name as broker_name,
    b.personality_type
  FROM (SELECT COALESCE({{$json["conversationId"] || 'NULL'}}, 0)::integer as conversation_id) as input
  LEFT JOIN broker_conversations bc
    ON bc.conversation_id = input.conversation_id
    AND bc.status = 'active'
  LEFT JOIN ai_brokers b
    ON bc.broker_id = b.id
  LIMIT 1;

SELECT 
  b.*,
  assign_best_broker(
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.leadScore }},
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.loanType }}',
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.propertyType }}',
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.monthlyIncome }},
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.timeline }}'
  ) as assigned_broker_id
FROM ai_brokers b
WHERE b.id = assign_best_broker(
  {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.leadScore }},
  '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.loanType }}',
  '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.propertyType }}',
  {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.monthlyIncome }},
  '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.timeline }}'
);

INSERT INTO broker_conversations (
    id,
    conversation_id,
    broker_id,
    contact_id,
    customer_name,
    customer_email,
    customer_phone,
    lead_score,
    loan_type,
    property_type,
    monthly_income,
    loan_amount,
    timeline,
    assignment_method,
    assignment_reason,
    status,
    assigned_at
  ) VALUES (
    gen_random_uuid(),
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.conversationId }},
    '{{ $('Assign Best Broker 2').item.json.assigned_broker_id }}',
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.contactId }},
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.name }}',
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.email || NULL }}',
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.phone || NULL }}',
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.leadScore }},
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.loanType }}',
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.propertyType }}',
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.monthlyIncome }},
    {{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.loanAmount || 0 }},
    '{{ $('Extract Customer Profile').item.json.timeline }}',
    'auto',
    'Best match based on lead score and profile',
    'active',
    NOW()
  )
  RETURNING *;

SELECT
    b.*
  FROM ai_brokers b
  WHERE b.id = '{{$json["broker_id"]}}'
  LIMIT 1;

-- Update conversation metrics
  UPDATE broker_conversations
  SET
    messages_exchanged = {{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.messageCount}},
    broker_messages = broker_messages + 1,
    last_message_at = NOW(),
    handoff_triggered = {{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.shouldHandoff}},
    handoff_reason = '{{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.handoffReason}}',
    handoff_at = CASE WHEN {{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.shouldHandoff}} THEN NOW() ELSE handoff_at END,
    status = CASE WHEN {{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.shouldHandoff}} THEN 'handoff_requested' ELSE 'active'
  END
  WHERE conversation_id = {{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.conversationId}};

  -- Update broker metrics
  UPDATE ai_brokers
  SET
    total_messages_sent = total_messages_sent + 1,
    last_active_at = NOW()
  WHERE id = '{{$('Check Handoff Triggers').first().json.brokerId}}';

message.content: I want to refinance my condo loan. Current rates are too high and I heard there are better options now.
